ComicInfo.Summary:
It’s puppet-on-puppet violence as the cult favorite Puppet Master puppets battle Anapa and his evil horde! As the battle rages, Anthony learns the truth about his destiny… and everything begins to change!
Variant covers limited to 1,500 copies each.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Daniel J. Logan (p, i) & Yann Perrelet (c) | 1 | B | Hand Painted Cover B, Limited to 1500 | Kelly Williams | 2 | C | Kill Cover C, Limited to 1500 | Andrew Magnum (p, i) & Gene Jimenez (c) | 3 | D | Photo Cover D, Limited to 1500 | Photo | 4 | Note: The digital edition (11/29/2017) for this issue was released before the print edition.
